title.narrative: Marketing/Storage/Processing: Rural Livelihoods and Economic Enhancement Programme

description.narrative: The programme goal is to sustainably improve the incomes of economically active poor rural households engaged in the production and marketing of selected agricultural and livestock commodities by advancing their integration with the emerging commercial sector. Objectives are to: (i) strengthen value chains and enhance the enabling environment to make it more conducive to rural commercial development; and (ii) improve linkages of farmers to value chains by establishing more efficient production, transport, storage, processing and marketing systems for target commodities, thereby expanding economic activity and employment.

name.narrative: Marketing/Storage/Processing: Rural Livelihoods and Economic Enhancement Programme

description.narrative: This point represents the centroid of the project area. For more detailed geographic information, please refer to the project page on the IFAD website.
